modName: Miraak Unlimited Enchant with Playable Ash Weapons
summary: Makes Miraaks sword enchant last forever, and Ash weapons are no lootable off ashspawns.
descriptionHtml:
Made for me :p

Tho I figured id share since no one has done Playable ash weapons (And deadricly powered weapons should be unlimited...)

SOOO Share mah brilliance!
author: BrokenMirror
